channel.title: Mining Problem - Your Inventory Is full Appears AFTER I finished mining

item.title: Mining Problem - Your Inventory Is full Appears AFTER I finished mining
item.dc:creator: @Epic_One Epic One
item.description:
@Epic_One wrote:

I will in a second, Just bought Ipb Forums. Installing them + a few mods atm. So give me like 5 minutes. Btw - Rep++ once we get this working. :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 20, 2007, 04:13:15 AM[/size][hr][code] public boolean addItem(int item, int amount) {
if(item == -1)
return false;
if (!Item.itemStackable[item] || amount < 1) {
amount = 1;
}

	if ((freeSlots() >= amount && !Item.itemStackable[item]) || freeSlots() > 0) {
		for (int i = 0; i < playerItems.length; i++) {
			if (playerItems[i] == (item+1) && Item.itemStackable[item] && playerItems[i] > 0) {
				playerItems[i] = (item + 1);
				if ((playerItemsN[i] + amount) < maxItemAmount && (playerItemsN[i] + amount) > -1) {
					playerItemsN[i] += amount;
				} else {
					playerItemsN[i] = maxItemAmount;
				}
				outStream.createFrameVarSizeWord(34);
				outStream.writeWord(3214);
				outStream.writeByte(i);
				outStream.writeWord(playerItems[i]);
				if (playerItemsN[i] > 254) {
					outStream.writeByte(255);
					outStream.writeDWord(playerItemsN[i]);
				} else {
					outStream.writeByte(playerItemsN[i]); //amount	
				}
				outStream.endFrameVarSizeWord();
				i = 30;
				return true;
			}
		}
                for (int i = 0; i < playerItems.length; i++) {
			if (playerItems[i] <= 0) {
				playerItems[i] = item+1;
				if (amount < maxItemAmount && amount > -1) {
					playerItemsN[i] = amount;
				} else {
					playerItemsN[i] = maxItemAmount;
				}
				outStream.createFrameVarSizeWord(34);
				outStream.writeWord(3214);
				outStream.writeByte(i);
				outStream.writeWord(playerItems[i]);
				if (playerItemsN[i] > 254) {
					outStream.writeByte(255);
					outStream.writeDWord(playerItemsN[i]);
				} else {
					outStream.writeByte(playerItemsN[i]); //amount	
				}
				outStream.endFrameVarSizeWord();
				i = 30;
				return true;
			}
		}
		return false;
	} else {
		sendMessage("Not enough space in your inventory.");
		return false;
	}
}[/code][br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 20, 2007, 10:49:04 AM[/size][hr]I still am looking for help on this, I beleive we were adding it to the wrong method. But my Mining Void is fucked.. >.<. If anyone knows what to do - let me know.

Read full topic

item.title: Mining Problem - Your Inventory Is full Appears AFTER I finished mining
item.dc:creator: @Epic_One Epic One
item.description:
@Epic_One wrote:

Works, Except I still have the same problem… It mines the ore, then says no inventory space.

But I think were editing the wrong portion as it still says “not enough space in inventory” and not “No inventory space” as you changed it too…

item.source: Mining Problem - Your Inventory Is full Appears AFTER I finished mining

item.title: Mining Problem - Your Inventory Is full Appears AFTER I finished mining
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[code]MINING/
public boolean mining() {
int MIPickAxe = 0;
int RndGems = 50;
if (IsMining == true) {
MIPickAxe = 1; //If Mining -> Go trough loop, passby MICheckPickAxe to prevent originalweapon loss, 1 to tell you got pick axe, no function left for MIPickAxe if mining, so 1 is enough.
} else {
MIPickAxe = MICheckPickAxe();
}
if (MIPickAxe > 0) {
if (playerLevel[playerMining] >= mining[1]) {
if (actionTimer == 0 && IsMining == false) {
if (freeSlots() > 0) {
actionAmount++;
sendMessage(“You swing your pick axe at the rock…”);
actionTimer = (int)((mining[0] + 10) - MIPickAxe);
if (actionTimer < 1) {
actionTimer = 1;
IsMining = false;
return false;
}
setAnimation(0x554);
IsMining = false;
} else {
sendMessage(“No inventory space”);
}
}

				 if (actionTimer == 0 && IsMining == true) {
					if (IsItemInBag(1706) == true || IsItemInBag(1708) == true || IsItemInBag(1710) == true || IsItemInBag(1712) == true) {
						RndGems /= 2;
					}
					if (misc.random(RndGems) == (int)(RndGems / 4)) {
						addSkillXP((65 * mining[3]), playerMining);
						addItem(Item.randomNGems(), 1);
						sendMessage("You get a gem!");
					} else {
						addSkillXP((mining[2] * mining[3]), playerMining);
						addItem(mining[4], 1);
						sendMessage("You get some ores.");
					}
					playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = OriginalWeapon;
					OriginalWeapon = -1;
					playerEquipment[playerShield] = OriginalShield;
					OriginalShield = -1;
					resetAnimation();
					resetMI();
				}

			} else {
			sendMessage("You need "+mining[1]+" "+statName[playerMining]+" to mine those ores.");
			resetMI();
			return false;
		}
	} else {
		sendMessage("You need a pick axe to mine ores.");
		resetMI();
		return false;
	}
	return false;
}
public boolean resetMI() {
	mining[0] = 0;
	mining[1] = 0;
	mining[2] = 0;
	mining[4] = 0;
	skillX = -1;
	skillY = -1;
	IsMining = false;
	IsUsingSkill = false;
	return true;
}
public int MICheckPickAxe() {
	int Hand;
	int Shield;
	int Bag;
	int PickAxe;
	Hand = playerEquipment[playerWeapon];
	Shield = playerEquipment[playerShield];
	PickAxe = 0;
	switch (Hand) {
		case 1265: //Bronze Pick Axe
			PickAxe = 1; break;
		case 1267: //Iron Pick Axe
			PickAxe = 2; break;
		case 1269: //Steel Pick Axe
			PickAxe = 3; break;
		case 1273: //Mithril Pick Axe
			PickAxe = 4; break;
		case 1271: //Adamant Pick Axe
			PickAxe = 5; break;
		case 1275: //Rune Pick Axe
			PickAxe = 6; break;
	}
	if (PickAxe > 0) {
		OriginalWeapon = Hand;
		OriginalShield = Shield;
		playerEquipment[playerShield] = -1;
		return PickAxe;
	}
	Bag = -1;
	for (int i = 0; i < playerItems.length; i++) {
		Bag = playerItems[i];
		Bag -=1; //Only to fix the ID !
		if (Bag == 1265 || Bag == 1267 || Bag == 1269 || Bag == 1271 || Bag == 1273 || Bag == 1275) {
			break;
		}
	}
	switch (Bag) {
		case 1265: //Bronze Pick Axe
			PickAxe = 1; break;
		case 1267: //Iron Pick Axe
			PickAxe = 2; break;
		case 1269: //Steel Pick Axe
			PickAxe = 3; break;
		case 1273: //Mithril Pick Axe
			PickAxe = 4; break;
		case 1271: //Adamant Pick Axe
			PickAxe = 5; break;
		case 1275: //Rune Pick Axe
			PickAxe = 6; break;
	}
	if (PickAxe > 0) {
		OriginalWeapon = Hand;
		OriginalShield = Shield;
		playerEquipment[playerShield] = -1;
		playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = Bag;
	}
	return PickAxe;
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.source: Mining Problem - Your Inventory Is full Appears AFTER I finished mining

item.title: Mining Problem - Your Inventory Is full Appears AFTER I finished mining
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Oh, missed a brace.

[code]MINING/
public boolean mining() {
int MIPickAxe = 0;
int RndGems = 50;
if (IsMining == true) {
MIPickAxe = 1; //If Mining -> Go trough loop, passby MICheckPickAxe to prevent originalweapon loss, 1 to tell you got pick axe, no function left for MIPickAxe if mining, so 1 is enough.
} else {
MIPickAxe = MICheckPickAxe();
}
if (MIPickAxe > 0) {
if (playerLevel[playerMining] >= mining[1]) {
if (actionTimer == 0 && IsMining == false) {
if (freeSlots() > 0) {
actionAmount++;
sendMessage(“You swing your pick axe at the rock…”);
actionTimer = (int)((mining[0] + 10) - MIPickAxe);
if (actionTimer < 1) {
actionTimer = 1;
IsMining = false;
return false;
}
setAnimation(0x554);
IsMining = false;
} else {
sendMessage(“No inventory space”);
}
}

				 if (actionTimer == 0 && IsMining == true) {
					if (IsItemInBag(1706) == true || IsItemInBag(1708) == true || IsItemInBag(1710) == true || IsItemInBag(1712) == true) {
						RndGems /= 2;
					}
					if (misc.random(RndGems) == (int)(RndGems / 4)) {
						addSkillXP((65 * mining[3]), playerMining);
						addItem(Item.randomNGems(), 1);
						sendMessage("You get a gem!");
					} else {
						addSkillXP((mining[2] * mining[3]), playerMining);
						addItem(mining[4], 1);
						sendMessage("You get some ores.");
					}
					playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = OriginalWeapon;
					OriginalWeapon = -1;
					playerEquipment[playerShield] = OriginalShield;
					OriginalShield = -1;
					resetAnimation();
					resetMI();
				}

			} else {
			sendMessage("You need "+mining[1]+" "+statName[playerMining]+" to mine those ores.");
			resetMI();
			return false;
		}
	} else {
		sendMessage("You need a pick axe to mine ores.");
		resetMI();
		return false;
	}
	return false;
}

}
return false;

}
public boolean resetMI() {
mining[0] = 0;
mining[1] = 0;
mining[2] = 0;
mining[4] = 0;
skillX = -1;
skillY = -1;
IsMining = false;
IsUsingSkill = false;
return true;
}
public int MICheckPickAxe() {
int Hand;
int Shield;
int Bag;
int PickAxe;
Hand = playerEquipment[playerWeapon];
Shield = playerEquipment[playerShield];
PickAxe = 0;
switch (Hand) {
case 1265: //Bronze Pick Axe
PickAxe = 1; break;
case 1267: //Iron Pick Axe
PickAxe = 2; break;
case 1269: //Steel Pick Axe
PickAxe = 3; break;
case 1273: //Mithril Pick Axe
PickAxe = 4; break;
case 1271: //Adamant Pick Axe
PickAxe = 5; break;
case 1275: //Rune Pick Axe
PickAxe = 6; break;
}
if (PickAxe > 0) {
OriginalWeapon = Hand;
OriginalShield = Shield;
playerEquipment[playerShield] = -1;
return PickAxe;
}
Bag = -1;
for (int i = 0; i < playerItems.length; i++) {
Bag = playerItems[i];
Bag -=1; //Only to fix the ID !
if (Bag == 1265 || Bag == 1267 || Bag == 1269 || Bag == 1271 || Bag == 1273 || Bag == 1275) {
break;
}
}
switch (Bag) {
case 1265: //Bronze Pick Axe
PickAxe = 1; break;
case 1267: //Iron Pick Axe
PickAxe = 2; break;
case 1269: //Steel Pick Axe
PickAxe = 3; break;
case 1273: //Mithril Pick Axe
PickAxe = 4; break;
case 1271: //Adamant Pick Axe
PickAxe = 5; break;
case 1275: //Rune Pick Axe
PickAxe = 6; break;
}
if (PickAxe > 0) {
OriginalWeapon = Hand;
OriginalShield = Shield;
playerEquipment[playerShield] = -1;
playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = Bag;
}
return PickAxe;
}[/code]

item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[code]MINING/
public boolean mining() {
int MIPickAxe = 0;
int RndGems = 50;
if (IsMining == true) {
MIPickAxe = 1; //If Mining -> Go trough loop, passby MICheckPickAxe to prevent originalweapon loss, 1 to tell you got pick axe, no function left for MIPickAxe if mining, so 1 is enough.
} else {
MIPickAxe = MICheckPickAxe();
}
if (MIPickAxe > 0) {
if (playerLevel[playerMining] >= mining[1]) {
if (actionTimer == 0 && IsMining == false) {
if (freeSlots() > 0) {
actionAmount++;
sendMessage(“You swing your pick axe at the rock…”);
actionTimer = (int)((mining[0] + 10) - MIPickAxe);
if (actionTimer < 1) {
actionTimer = 1;
IsMining = false;
return false;
}
setAnimation(0x554);
IsMining = false;
} else {
sendMessage(“No inventory space”);
}

				 if (actionTimer == 0 && IsMining == true) {
					if (IsItemInBag(1706) == true || IsItemInBag(1708) == true || IsItemInBag(1710) == true || IsItemInBag(1712) == true) {
						RndGems /= 2;
					}
					if (misc.random(RndGems) == (int)(RndGems / 4)) {
						addSkillXP((65 * mining[3]), playerMining);
						addItem(Item.randomNGems(), 1);
						sendMessage("You get a gem!");
					} else {
						addSkillXP((mining[2] * mining[3]), playerMining);
						addItem(mining[4], 1);
						sendMessage("You get some ores.");
					}
					playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = OriginalWeapon;
					OriginalWeapon = -1;
					playerEquipment[playerShield] = OriginalShield;
					OriginalShield = -1;
					resetAnimation();
					resetMI();
				}

			} else {
			sendMessage("You need "+mining[1]+" "+statName[playerMining]+" to mine those ores.");
			resetMI();
			return false;
		}
	} else {
		sendMessage("You need a pick axe to mine ores.");
		resetMI();
		return false;
	}
	return false;
}

}
return false;

}
public boolean resetMI() {
mining[0] = 0;
mining[1] = 0;
mining[2] = 0;
mining[4] = 0;
skillX = -1;
skillY = -1;
IsMining = false;
IsUsingSkill = false;
return true;
}
public int MICheckPickAxe() {
int Hand;
int Shield;
int Bag;
int PickAxe;
Hand = playerEquipment[playerWeapon];
Shield = playerEquipment[playerShield];
PickAxe = 0;
switch (Hand) {
case 1265: //Bronze Pick Axe
PickAxe = 1; break;
case 1267: //Iron Pick Axe
PickAxe = 2; break;
case 1269: //Steel Pick Axe
PickAxe = 3; break;
case 1273: //Mithril Pick Axe
PickAxe = 4; break;
case 1271: //Adamant Pick Axe
PickAxe = 5; break;
case 1275: //Rune Pick Axe
PickAxe = 6; break;
}
if (PickAxe > 0) {
OriginalWeapon = Hand;
OriginalShield = Shield;
playerEquipment[playerShield] = -1;
return PickAxe;
}
Bag = -1;
for (int i = 0; i < playerItems.length; i++) {
Bag = playerItems[i];
Bag -=1; //Only to fix the ID !
if (Bag == 1265 || Bag == 1267 || Bag == 1269 || Bag == 1271 || Bag == 1273 || Bag == 1275) {
break;
}
}
switch (Bag) {
case 1265: //Bronze Pick Axe
PickAxe = 1; break;
case 1267: //Iron Pick Axe
PickAxe = 2; break;
case 1269: //Steel Pick Axe
PickAxe = 3; break;
case 1273: //Mithril Pick Axe
PickAxe = 4; break;
case 1271: //Adamant Pick Axe
PickAxe = 5; break;
case 1275: //Rune Pick Axe
PickAxe = 6; break;
}
if (PickAxe > 0) {
OriginalWeapon = Hand;
OriginalShield = Shield;
playerEquipment[playerShield] = -1;
playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = Bag;
}
return PickAxe;
}[/code]
Try that.

item.title: Mining Problem - Your Inventory Is full Appears AFTER I finished mining
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“Epic One, post:7, topic:166131”]Testing - Will edit once I compile & run.

Error:

client.java:28093: unexpected type
required: variable
found : value
if (freeSlots() = 0) {
^
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
1 error
Files Compiled Successfully!
Press any key to continue . . .[/quote]
Oops shit. Try this.

[code]/MINING/
public boolean mining() {
int MIPickAxe = 0;
int RndGems = 50;
if (IsMining == true) {
MIPickAxe = 1; //If Mining -> Go trough loop, passby MICheckPickAxe to prevent originalweapon loss, 1 to tell you got pick axe, no function left for MIPickAxe if mining, so 1 is enough.
} else {
MIPickAxe = MICheckPickAxe();
}
if (MIPickAxe > 0) {
if (playerLevel[playerMining] >= mining[1]) {
if (actionTimer == 0 && IsMining == false) {
if (freeSlots() > 0) {
actionAmount++;
sendMessage(“You swing your pick axe at the rock…”);
actionTimer = (int)((mining[0] + 10) - MIPickAxe);
if (actionTimer < 1) {
actionTimer = 1;
if (freeSlots() == 0) {
sendMessage(“You do not have enough inventory space.”);
IsMining = false;
return false;
}
setAnimation(0x554);
IsMining = false;
}

				 if (actionTimer == 0 && IsMining == true) {
					if (IsItemInBag(1706) == true || IsItemInBag(1708) == true || IsItemInBag(1710) == true || IsItemInBag(1712) == true) {
						RndGems /= 2;
					}
					if (misc.random(RndGems) == (int)(RndGems / 4)) {
						addSkillXP((65 * mining[3]), playerMining);
						addItem(Item.randomNGems(), 1);
						sendMessage("You get a gem!");
					} else {
						addSkillXP((mining[2] * mining[3]), playerMining);
						addItem(mining[4], 1);
						sendMessage("You get some ores.");
					}
					playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = OriginalWeapon;
					OriginalWeapon = -1;
					playerEquipment[playerShield] = OriginalShield;
					OriginalShield = -1;
					resetAnimation();
					resetMI();
				}

			} else {
			sendMessage("You need "+mining[1]+" "+statName[playerMining]+" to mine those ores.");
			resetMI();
			return false;
		}
	} else {
		sendMessage("You need a pick axe to mine ores.");
		resetMI();
		return false;
	}
	return false;
}

}
return false;

}
public boolean resetMI() {
mining[0] = 0;
mining[1] = 0;
mining[2] = 0;
mining[4] = 0;
skillX = -1;
skillY = -1;
IsMining = false;
IsUsingSkill = false;
return true;
}
public int MICheckPickAxe() {
int Hand;
int Shield;
int Bag;
int PickAxe;
Hand = playerEquipment[playerWeapon];
Shield = playerEquipment[playerShield];
PickAxe = 0;
switch (Hand) {
case 1265: //Bronze Pick Axe
PickAxe = 1; break;
case 1267: //Iron Pick Axe
PickAxe = 2; break;
case 1269: //Steel Pick Axe
PickAxe = 3; break;
case 1273: //Mithril Pick Axe
PickAxe = 4; break;
case 1271: //Adamant Pick Axe
PickAxe = 5; break;
case 1275: //Rune Pick Axe
PickAxe = 6; break;
}
if (PickAxe > 0) {
OriginalWeapon = Hand;
OriginalShield = Shield;
playerEquipment[playerShield] = -1;
return PickAxe;
}
Bag = -1;
for (int i = 0; i < playerItems.length; i++) {
Bag = playerItems[i];
Bag -=1; //Only to fix the ID !
if (Bag == 1265 || Bag == 1267 || Bag == 1269 || Bag == 1271 || Bag == 1273 || Bag == 1275) {
break;
}
}
switch (Bag) {
case 1265: //Bronze Pick Axe
PickAxe = 1; break;
case 1267: //Iron Pick Axe
PickAxe = 2; break;
case 1269: //Steel Pick Axe
PickAxe = 3; break;
case 1273: //Mithril Pick Axe
PickAxe = 4; break;
case 1271: //Adamant Pick Axe
PickAxe = 5; break;
case 1275: //Rune Pick Axe
PickAxe = 6; break;
}
if (PickAxe > 0) {
OriginalWeapon = Hand;
OriginalShield = Shield;
playerEquipment[playerShield] = -1;
playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = Bag;
}
return PickAxe;
}
[/code]

[code]/MINING/
public boolean mining() {
int MIPickAxe = 0;
int RndGems = 50;
if (IsMining == true) {
MIPickAxe = 1; //If Mining -> Go trough loop, passby MICheckPickAxe to prevent originalweapon loss, 1 to tell you got pick axe, no function left for MIPickAxe if mining, so 1 is enough.
} else {

}
if (MIPickAxe > 0) {
if (playerLevel[playerMining] >= mining[1]) {
if (actionTimer == 0 && IsMining == false) {
if (freeSlots() > 0) {
actionAmount++;
sendMessage(“You swing your pick axe at the rock…”);
actionTimer = (int)((mining[0] + 10) - MIPickAxe);
if (actionTimer < 1) {
actionTimer = 1;
if (freeSlots() = 0) {
sendMessage(“You do not have enough inventory space.”);
IsMining = false;
return false;
}
setAnimation(0x554);
IsMining = false;
}

				 if (actionTimer == 0 && IsMining == true) {
					if (IsItemInBag(1706) == true || IsItemInBag(1708) == true || IsItemInBag(1710) == true || IsItemInBag(1712) == true) {
						RndGems /= 2;
					}
					if (misc.random(RndGems) == (int)(RndGems / 4)) {
						addSkillXP((65 * mining[3]), playerMining);
						addItem(Item.randomNGems(), 1);
						sendMessage("You get a gem!");
					} else {
						addSkillXP((mining[2] * mining[3]), playerMining);
						addItem(mining[4], 1);
						sendMessage("You get some ores.");
					}
					playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = OriginalWeapon;
					OriginalWeapon = -1;
					playerEquipment[playerShield] = OriginalShield;
					OriginalShield = -1;
					resetAnimation();
					resetMI();
				}

			} else {
			sendMessage("You need "+mining[1]+" "+statName[playerMining]+" to mine those ores.");
			resetMI();
			return false;
		}
	} else {
		sendMessage("You need a pick axe to mine ores.");
		resetMI();
		return false;
	}
	return false;
}

}
return false;

}
public boolean resetMI() {
mining[0] = 0;
mining[1] = 0;
mining[2] = 0;
mining[4] = 0;
skillX = -1;
skillY = -1;
IsMining = false;
IsUsingSkill = false;
return true;
}
public int MICheckPickAxe() {
int Hand;
int Shield;
int Bag;
int PickAxe;
Hand = playerEquipment[playerWeapon];
Shield = playerEquipment[playerShield];
PickAxe = 0;
switch (Hand) {
case 1265: //Bronze Pick Axe
PickAxe = 1; break;
case 1267: //Iron Pick Axe
PickAxe = 2; break;
case 1269: //Steel Pick Axe
PickAxe = 3; break;
case 1273: //Mithril Pick Axe
PickAxe = 4; break;
case 1271: //Adamant Pick Axe
PickAxe = 5; break;
case 1275: //Rune Pick Axe
PickAxe = 6; break;
}
if (PickAxe > 0) {
OriginalWeapon = Hand;
OriginalShield = Shield;
playerEquipment[playerShield] = -1;
return PickAxe;
}
Bag = -1;
for (int i = 0; i < playerItems.length; i++) {
Bag = playerItems[i];
Bag -=1; //Only to fix the ID !
if (Bag == 1265 || Bag == 1267 || Bag == 1269 || Bag == 1271 || Bag == 1273 || Bag == 1275) {
break;
}
}
switch (Bag) {
case 1265: //Bronze Pick Axe
PickAxe = 1; break;
case 1267: //Iron Pick Axe
PickAxe = 2; break;
case 1269: //Steel Pick Axe
PickAxe = 3; break;
case 1273: //Mithril Pick Axe
PickAxe = 4; break;
case 1271: //Adamant Pick Axe
PickAxe = 5; break;
case 1275: //Rune Pick Axe
PickAxe = 6; break;
}
if (PickAxe > 0) {
OriginalWeapon = Hand;
OriginalShield = Shield;
playerEquipment[playerShield] = -1;
playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = Bag;
}
return PickAxe;
}[/code]
You had >= 0 for how many slots are free. Which means, greater and or equal.

item.dc:creator: @Epic_One Epic One
item.description:
@Epic_One wrote:

[code]/MINING/
public boolean mining() {
int MIPickAxe = 0;
int RndGems = 50;
if (IsMining == true) {
MIPickAxe = 1; //If Mining -> Go trough loop, passby MICheckPickAxe to prevent originalweapon loss, 1 to tell you got pick axe, no function left for MIPickAxe if mining, so 1 is enough.
} else {
MIPickAxe = MICheckPickAxe();
}
if (MIPickAxe > 0) {
if (playerLevel[playerMining] >= mining[1]) {
if (actionTimer == 0 && IsMining == false) {
if (freeSlots() > 0) {
actionAmount++;
sendMessage(“You swing your pick axe at the rock…”);
actionTimer = (int)((mining[0] + 10) - MIPickAxe);
if (actionTimer < 1) {
actionTimer = 1;
if (freeSlots() <= 0) {
sendMessage(“You do not have enough inventory space.”);
IsMining = false;
return false;
}
setAnimation(0x554);
IsMining = false;
}

				 if (actionTimer == 0 && IsMining == true) {
					if (IsItemInBag(1706) == true || IsItemInBag(1708) == true || IsItemInBag(1710) == true || IsItemInBag(1712) == true) {
						RndGems /= 2;
					}
					if (misc.random(RndGems) == (int)(RndGems / 4)) {
						addSkillXP((65 * mining[3]), playerMining);
						addItem(Item.randomNGems(), 1);
						sendMessage("You get a gem!");
					} else {
						addSkillXP((mining[2] * mining[3]), playerMining);
						addItem(mining[4], 1);
						sendMessage("You get some ores.");
					}
					playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = OriginalWeapon;
					OriginalWeapon = -1;
					playerEquipment[playerShield] = OriginalShield;
					OriginalShield = -1;
					resetAnimation();
					resetMI();
				}

			} else {
			sendMessage("You need "+mining[1]+" "+statName[playerMining]+" to mine those ores.");
			resetMI();
			return false;
		}
	} else {
		sendMessage("You need a pick axe to mine ores.");
		resetMI();
		return false;
	}
	return false;
}

}
return false;

}
public boolean resetMI() {
mining[0] = 0;
mining[1] = 0;
mining[2] = 0;
mining[4] = 0;
skillX = -1;
skillY = -1;

}
public int MICheckPickAxe() {
int Hand;
int Shield;
int Bag;
int PickAxe;
Hand = playerEquipment[playerWeapon];
Shield = playerEquipment[playerShield];
PickAxe = 0;
switch (Hand) {
case 1265: //Bronze Pick Axe
PickAxe = 1; break;
case 1267: //Iron Pick Axe
PickAxe = 2; break;
case 1269: //Steel Pick Axe
PickAxe = 3; break;
case 1273: //Mithril Pick Axe
PickAxe = 4; break;
case 1271: //Adamant Pick Axe
PickAxe = 5; break;
case 1275: //Rune Pick Axe
PickAxe = 6; break;
}
if (PickAxe > 0) {
OriginalWeapon = Hand;
OriginalShield = Shield;
playerEquipment[playerShield] = -1;
return PickAxe;
}
Bag = -1;
for (int i = 0; i < playerItems.length; i++) {
Bag = playerItems[i];
Bag -=1; //Only to fix the ID !
if (Bag == 1265 || Bag == 1267 || Bag == 1269 || Bag == 1271 || Bag == 1273 || Bag == 1275) {
break;
}
}
switch (Bag) {
case 1265: //Bronze Pick Axe

item.title: Mining Problem - Your Inventory Is full Appears AFTER I finished mining
item.dc:creator: @Epic_One Epic One
item.description:
@Epic_One wrote:

Hello, I’ve been spending the past 2 hours to get this code to work, still to no avail - So i’m here seeking some help.

I have added mining to my server, now I’m trying to make it so if the user has no free slots in there inventory then they can not mine - But - It’s not stopping them from mining and it’s sending the message after the “You have mined some coal” Ect. Any help would be greatly appreciated.

public boolean mining() { int MIPickAxe = 0; int RndGems = 50; if (IsMining == true) { MIPickAxe = 1; //If Mining -> Go trough loop, passby MICheckPickAxe to prevent originalweapon loss, 1 to tell you got pick axe, no function left for MIPickAxe if mining, so 1 is enough. } else { MIPickAxe = MICheckPickAxe(); } if (MIPickAxe > 0) { if (playerLevel[playerMining] >= mining[1]) { if (actionTimer == 0 && IsMining == false) { if (freeSlots() > 0) { actionAmount++; sendMessage("You swing your pick axe at the rock..."); actionTimer = (int)((mining[0] + 10) - MIPickAxe); if (actionTimer < 1) { actionTimer = 1; if (freeSlots() <= 0) { sendMessage("You do not have enough inventory space."); IsMining = false; return false; } setAnimation(0x554); IsMining = false; }

Is the code.
I have added it properly to Thieving, Woodcutting, Fishing… Just can’t seem to get the mining to work. Also there is No errors upon compilation, I’f that helps any.
